posts.title: Making a blog with Directus, MDX, and Next.js On-Demand ISR
posts.brief: There are many Headless CMSs out there and many other tools that let us make a blog easily and quickly. Today we look at building a blog with Directus and Next.js. We will use MDX to store our blog content in Directus. We are also going to use Next.j...

posts.title: 5 Chrome Keyboard Shortcuts to boost your productivity
